title: One Piece: The Diary of Koby-Meppo Arc | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Editorial Team
description: A comprehensive summary and review of the Diary of Koby-Meppo arc (Episodes 68-69), noting character development of Koby and Helmeppo and themes of friendship and determination.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers only episodes 68-69 with no future spoilers

title: One Piece Diaries #9 – The Diary Of Koby-Meppo
author: Comicon Editorial
description: A detailed review focusing on episodes 68-69, with particular interest in Helmeppo's character arc and growth from antagonist to sympathetic Marine recruit.

title: Diary of Koby-Meppo - One Piece Arc Analysis
author: Fandorable
description: Analysis of the arc's themes, production details, and cultural impact. The arc received positive critical reception for its compelling narrative and character development, with critics and fans praising it for its ability to engage audiences through its twists and turns, as well as its emotional depth.
